title: Stunt Simulator

content.developer: Stunt Simulator is created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› CarStunt SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenStunt Simulator is the perfect game for racing and drifting. The cars are designed with realistic controls that will captivate you even if you are a beginner. The more speed you have, the more amazing drift you make and score big number.We have preapared 2 maps to show off your driving skills. There are 10 cars ready to be tested: • Compact • Muscle • Coupe Sport • Super • Truck• Racer • Concept • APC• Big Rig Stunt Simulator Display:• Score (displayed on the top left)• Gear & speed (displayed on the bottom right)Controls:WASD or arrow keys to drive carEsc to exit to pause menuDeveloperStunt Simulator is created by FreezeNova.This article was updated on January 24, 20243DCarCrashCrazyDriftDrivingFreeRacingSimulatorUnity
